General.Name: Suzhou Jin Hong Shun Auto Parts Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Suzhou Jin Hong Shun Auto Parts Co., Ltd. produces and sells automobile body and chassis stamping parts, and related molds. It offers ultra-high strength body parts, body assemblies, pipe fittings, lightweight material stamping parts, new energy battery box parts, chassis stamping parts and integrated assemblies, and brake booster housing products. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Zhangjiagang, China.
